title: Nation to mark Kashmir Day in impressive manner: Barrister Sultan
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jan 31 (APP):President Pakistan Tehreek-i-Insaf (PTI) Azad Jammu Kashmir (AJK) and former Prime Minister AJK Barrister Sultan Mahmood Chaudhry on Friday said that whole nation would mark February 5 as Kashmir day in impressive manner to express solidarity with the brothers and sisters of Indian Occupied Kashmir.
In a statement, he said “We mark February 5 as Kashmir Day from last 30 years but for the first time on desire of Prime Minister Imran Khan, this day will be marked nationwide to give strong message to the world.”
He said that the entire nation would be mobilized against Indian oppression in the light of Prime Minister’s vision and leadership.
Barrister Sultan Mahmood said that our mothers and sisters in IOK were giving sacrifices and it was our responsibility to take part in the public gathering in connection with Kashmir Day.
He said that AJK Prime Minister Raja Farooq Haider Khan would also participate in the public gathering, adding that on Kashmir issue, the whole nation was united.
He said that the workers and leaderships of all the political parties of Azad Jammu Kashmir would also participate in Kashmir Day public gathering and rallies.
He said that USA President Donald Trump had once again offered mediation on Kashmir dispute between Pakistan and India, adding that it was proved that world community considers Kashmir issue as an international dispute.
